abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Analyze an input to identify, isolate, and characterize its essential components, attributes, and relationships that define its structure and function.
Generate a set of distinct variant outputs by applying defined transformations or processes to an initial input or representation under specified criteria or constraints.
Derive a target output by applying defined operations, transformations, or mappings to given inputs under specified conditions or criteria.
End of current sequential code flow
